name: Zahra Bashir
about_me: Hi! I'm Zahra, a senior undergraduate student at IUST. In the recent years, I've become interested in AI and specifically Machine Learning. Now, I am in my 8th semester, and I'm busy doing my Final Project of BSc. I have received fully-funded admission offers for a master's degree from three universities including, the University of Alberta, Simon Frasor University, and University of Western Ontario for Fall 2020. Unfortunately, due to the pandemic, I cannot travel to Canada for the Fall semester. So, I am still in Iran working on my final project and some other projects as well.

workingExperience.name: Back-end developer at D & C (Ravandyar) company
notes: Developing back-end part of an app related to ”BlockChains” and money transfer
Technology Stack: Python, Django-Rest, Git, Jira

TeachingExperience.name: Theory of Languages and Automata TA

AcademicExperience.name: Machine Learning Researcher at MAS Lab
notes: Under the supervision of Dr. Mozayyani
Researching on ”Image Caption Generation” and customizing image captioning in Farsi

AcademicExperience.name: ChillinWars Developer and Technical Manager
notes: ChillinWars is Iran University of Science and Technology’s AI contest. It’s been held every year in Iran as a well-known programming contest in form of artificial intelligence implementation
Working as a full-stack developer of Junior Game of this competitions in 2018 -2019 with its exclusive framework

education.name: B.Sc. in Computer Engineering with a concentration on AI
notes: Iran University of Science and Technology, Tehran, Iran
Ranked 3rd among Iran Universities based on QS Ranking

education.name: Diploma in Mathematics and Physics Discipline
notes: Affiliated with the National Organization for Development of Exceptional Talents

experienceDescriptionCard1.name: Game Development
experienceDescriptionCard1.content: There is no part of the game development pipeline that I have not touched, and while every aspect of it is fun, I particularly enjoy network and gameplay programming.

experienceDescriptionCard2.name: Programming
experienceDescriptionCard2.content: I love making useful apps, services and solutions. For me it is fun, while my focus is on game development, I am also making prototypes of services, scripts, and other things that can make my (and your!) life easier.
